item_description: A plain white candle. It is very smooth, round, and about 3 inches long.
A metallic lamp that can be lit, and will oil at a steady rate.
A metallic prism of base metal that can be worked by a smith.
A metallic key. It has distictive teeth...
A metallic lock. It has a distictive keyhole...
A metallic cutting tool, with a balanced handle.
A roll of paper that shows nearby locations.
A specimen of locally growing herbs.
A super-item for all potions. The specific potion depends on the specific ingredients.
A group of special tools for making potions.
item_attributes: transforms specific herb combinations into Basic Herbal Remedies, Potions, or Poisons

item_description: A hunter's staple survival tool. Shoots basic arrow types.
A metal tipped flight shaft, with feathers for guidance.
A rigid leather container that can carry 20 arrows.
A full body covering of thick natural leather. Non-Flamable, Shock-Reistant.
A full body covering of thick natural fibers. Warning, flamable. Shock-Absorbing
A full body covering of thin natural fibers, with small pockets for spell components. Warning, flamable. Shock-Absorbing
A vial of permanent writting liquid, typically black. Enough to write 4 pages.
A small writting pen with an ink dispensing nib, holds 1 vial of ink inside, and can be reloaded. Includes a case.
A page of delicate writing skin suitable for maps, scrolls, contracts, or bounties.
A small amount of wax that can be used with a candle, or other light source to hold a scoll closed until broken.
A natural worked wooden staff with tighty woven coth bindings on either end. A staple of most travelers.
